text: Antoine Joseph Emmanuel Bernède (born 26 May 1999) is a French professional footballer. He plays as a midfielder for Austrian Bundesliga club Red Bull Salzburg. ==Club career== ===Paris Saint-Germain=== Bernède started his career with FC Solitaires Paris-Est and in 2012 he went on to Paris Saint-Germain. He made his professional debut on 4 August 2018 in the Trophée des Champions. He came in in the 74th minute for Thiago Silva in the 4–0 win against Monaco. ===Red Bull Salzburg=== On 6 February 2019 Bernède signed with Austrian Bundesliga club Red Bull Salzburg. ==Personal life== Bernède's mother is Cameroonian and his father is French. ==Career statistics== ===Club=== Club Season League National Cup League Cup Europe Other Total Division Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Paris Saint-Germain B 2016–17 National 2 17 1 — — — — 17 1 2017–18 9 0 — — — — 9 0 2018–19 4 0 — — — — 4 0 Total 30 1 — — — — 30 1 Paris Saint-Germain 2018–19 Ligue 1 2 0 0 0 0 0 0 0 1 0 3 0 Red Bull Salzburg 2018–19 Austrian Bundesliga 3 0 0 0 — — — 3 0 2019–20 10 0 3 0 — 2 0 — 15 0 2020–21 19 1 3 0 — 3 0 — 25 1 2021–22 17 0 4 0 — 0 0 — 21 0 Total 49 1 10 0 0 0 5 0 — 64 1 Career total 81 2 10 0 0 0 5 0 1 0 97 2 ==Honours== Paris Saint-Germain * Ligue 1: 2018–19 * Trophée des Champions: 2018 Red Bull Salzburg * Austrian Bundesliga: 2018–19, 2019–20, 2020–21, 2021-22 * Austrian Cup: 2018–19, 2019–20, 2020–21, 2021-22 ==References== ==Other websites== * * * Category:1999 births Category:Living people Category:Footballers from Paris Category:Association football midfielders Category:FC Red Bull Salzburg players Category:Austrian football champions
